title: [K-12] Large-Scale Ecological Learning Design for Language Proficiency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language analysis and academic inquiry skills
context.additional_context: A blended environment equipped with learner interaction and real-time feedback systems.

learning_goals: Learners can simulate and perform more than three real-world language problem-solving scenarios in a virtual environment using an ecological learning design framework.
Learners can develop two or more language use strategies reflecting cultural contexts through VR-based collaborative activities.
Learners can analyze formative assessment data to revise and optimize their language learning pathways at least once.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
